column8: text

Naib presiden PKR Rafizi Ramli hari ini mengotakan janjinya untuk mendedahkan nama bekas pemimpin PAS yang didakwa menerima dana 1MDB daripada akaun Perdana Menteri Datuk Seri Najib Razak.Dalam sidang media di ibu kota hari ini, Rafizi menamakan individu misteri itu sebagai bekas timbalan presiden PAS Nasharudin Mat Isa.Rafizi juga membuat akuan berkanun berhubung perkara itu.Pilihan Editor PRU14: Siapa pilihan peneroka Felda kali ini?Malaysiakini sedang cuba mendapatkan reaksi Nasharudin berkaitan dakwaan itu.http://m.malaysiakini.com/news/379022
rafizi is an idiot for telling this..Should have kept it until GE..Especially with no proof of money trail going from Nasharuddin into Current PAS leadership...

Zzz...after reading some comment, i wonder where people get their sources from...“On Jan 28, 2017, I met a former senior leader of MACC, who had led the probe on 1MDB and Najib’s involvement in the scandal,” the Pandan MP told a press conference aired on Facebook live today.“We shared information and knowledge about 1MDB… and he spoke about how MACC in its investigation, found that some of the amount channeled from SRC International to the prime minister’s personal account, were then transfered Nasharudin.”He also alleged that the former senior MACC officer had spoken of the time Kuala Nerus PAS MP Mohd Khairuddin Aman Razali had met him to inquire about the investigation on 1MDB.According to Rafizi, the officer had told him everything there is to know about the investigation, but Khairuddin had not said a word about it.http://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/...its-nasharudin/since Nasharuddin got kicked out of PAS in 2013, and money went into Bijan account around 2011 to 2013..safely can assume money did go into PAS leadership. Unless Rafizi can prove that money went further to current PAS leadership, rafizi is just barking at the hill...Side note, Where do people get their information from regarding Nasharuddin joining PAN?
